TopicTitle: New forum user but not so old KSP user. :)

Articles.Content: Hello out there. I am not new to KSP. Close to 300 hours already... But I am very new to this forum. I don't know how to set an avatar or any other fancy stuff. But I've made a bunch of SSTO's with FAR. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome to the forums B15HOP\_xmen!

You'll be able to set an avatar and "other fancy stuff" after three posts, which it seems that you have. All you have to do is click on the "Settings" at the top of the page and you can change what you like.

Glad to see that you made an account! Maybe I will eventually be able to see the SSTO's that you are talking about one day... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

All the best, SpaceExplorer
Welcome to the forums! Have a nice stay!
'Allo, please enjoy your flight. You will find the nearest emergency exit to your left. All seats are equipped with a sepatron and parachute in the case of spontaneous unplanned disassembly.

> 
> Welcome to the Forums!

Wait , you just joined yourself.... ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
